abstract: The Sikorsky S-76B helicopter, a luxury model widely used for V.I.P. travel, was a favorite of Mr. Bryant, who often commuted by helicopter during his playing career.
lead_paragraph: The helicopter that crashed into a hillside near Calabasas, Calif., on Sunday, killing Kobe Bryant and eight others, was a popular model used around the world in a wide variety of roles, from air ambulance to executive transportation.
